name: HARNESS
description:
❔What is this game?

This is an entry for TriJam #144, created in 1h35m using Crisp-game-lib.

💬Synopsis

You are hanging from a helicopter and are on the move. Whether due to gravity or fuel, the helicopter is slowly losing altitude! Use your two colored lifelines to absorb the mysterious arrows that are coming your way!

📚Rules
  • If the arrows are the same color, move up, if not, move down.
  • The lower the helicopter is flying, the higher the score per absorption.
  • However, the moment it makes contact with the ground, you die.
🎮Controls

Mouse pointer - or drag: Move the player

🔍Credits
  • Game engine: Crisp-game-lib
  • Sound: Automatic generation by Crisp-game-lib
  • Other tools: VSCode, Aseprite
